q1.title: Is it free?
q1.body: Yes! FocusField+ is free during the launch period. In the future, we may offer premium plans, always keeping a basic version accessible.

q2.title: Do I need to create an account?
q2.body: No, you can start right away. If you want to save your preferences, you can create a profile.

q3.title: How does the spiritual mode work?
q3.body: It‚Äôs designed to help you stay focused while maintaining a respectful connection with God, through music, guided silences, and uplifting content.

q4.title: Can I use it on mobile too?
q4.body: Yes! FocusField+ is optimized for mobile and a dedicated app is coming soon.
